# focus-trap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Trap the focus inside a specific container.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  |             | `boolean` | `false` |
